value.name: menu_type
value.label: Type
value.help: Go to the Menu Settings and Manage your menu.

value.name: menu_alignment
value.label: Align
value.help: Align the navbar.

value.name: menu_sub_indicator
value.label: Indicator
value.help: Select the indicator that will display where have the sub-menu items.

schema.name: menu_type
schema.label: Type
schema.help: Go to the Menu Settings and Manage your menu.

schema.name: menu_alignment
schema.label: Align
schema.help: Align the navbar.

schema.name: menu_sub_indicator
schema.label: Indicator
schema.help: Select the indicator that will display where have the sub-menu items.

value.name: dropdown_menu_open
value.label: Open Mode
value.help: Select the mode that will open the dropdown menu.

value.name: dropdown_dropbar
value.label: Dropbar
value.help: The dropdown full-width mode.

schema.name: dropdown_menu_open
schema.label: Open Mode
schema.help: Select the mode that will open the dropdown menu.

schema.name: dropdown_dropbar
schema.label: Dropbar
schema.help: The dropdown full-width mode.

value.name: mobile_dropdown_breakpoint
value.label: Breakpoint
value.help: Responsive menu breakpoint device. Off-canvas or dropdown menu will be shown.

value.name: mobile_dropdown_type
value.label: Menu Type
value.help: Choose offcanvas that will display the responsive mode from the selected device.

schema.name: mobile_dropdown_breakpoint
schema.label: Breakpoint
schema.help: Responsive menu breakpoint device. Off-canvas or dropdown menu will be shown.

schema.name: mobile_dropdown_type
schema.label: Menu Type
schema.help: Choose offcanvas that will display the responsive mode from the selected device.

value.name: horizontal
value.label: Horizontal
value.help: Horizontal Orientation

value.name: vertical
value.label: Vertical
value.help: Vertical Orientation

value.name: sticky_animation
value.label: Sticky Animation
value.help: Add an animation in order to have the sticky element reappear smoothly.

value.name: sticky_bottom
value.label: Sticky Bottom
value.help: Bind the sticky behavior to a specific element, so that it disappears after scrolling past that point of the page.

value.name: sticky_show_on_up
value.label: Sticky on scroll up
value.help: You can make the sticky element show only when scrolling up to save space. Together with an animation, this makes for a very smooth experience.

value.name: sticky_media
value.label: Responsive
value.help: The element will be sticky from the specified viewport width and upwards, but not below. Only numbers allowed.

value.name: sticky_offset
value.label: Offset
value.help: You can position the element below the viewport edge.

value.name: animation_repeat
value.label: Repeat
value.help: Applies animation every time the element is in view

value.name: animation_delay
value.label: Delay
value.help: Delay time in ms

schema.name: animation_repeat

value.name: custom_css
value.label: Css Code
value.help: Add your custom css code here. You can write dynamic css using %root% to replace it with element ID. eg - %root% {color:red;}

schema.name: custom_css
schema.label: Css Code
schema.help: Add your custom css code here. You can write dynamic css using %root% to replace it with element ID. eg - %root% {color:red;}

value.name: id
value.label: Css ID
value.help: Add your custom ID WITHOUT the '#'. eg - my-id

value.name: class
value.label: Css Class
value.help: Add your custom classes WITHOUT the dot and seperate by space. eg - first-class another-class

value.name: acl
value.label: Access Control
value.help: Joomla Access Control List
